message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You were too generous, let's try 60-40 the other way around!
You're being greedy, let's meet in the middle!
You're being too soft, let's try for more!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate, but I'll give you a chance to make it worth my while!
Last chance, take it or walk away!
You're trying to take the whole pie, but I'm not done yet!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'll take a larger share, and leave you with scraps!
This is my last stand, don't leave me with nothing!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take it all!
